summary: This is a brief internal email from July 24, 2019, referencing a GAN (Grand Jury Action Notice) for Jeffrey Epstein and indicating he was placed 'on Watch' following a phone call. It appears to be a reminder or confirmation about procedural steps taken by law enforcement.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Subject of GAN (Grand Jury Action Notice)
persons.context: The email indicates a GAN was issued for Epstein and that he was placed 'on Watch' as per a phone call.

events.title: GAN issued for Epstein
events.description: A Grand Jury Action Notice (GAN) was issued for Jeffrey Epstein, and he was placed 'on Watch' following a phone call.

keyFacts: A Grand Jury Action Notice (GAN) was issued for Jeffrey Epstein.
Epstein was placed 'on Watch' as a result of a phone call, indicating active monitoring by authorities.
The email is dated July 24, 2019, referencing an action from the previous day (July 23, 2019).
The document is marked 'CONFIDENTIAL' and appears to be internal correspondence within the SDNY (Southern District of New York).
